resources.string: Upgrade your membership to \n enjoy all the features of Booxtown
Welcome to the first specialized \nmarketplace and community \nfor pre-loved books!
Join us and share you passion for books and reading.\n\nListing books is always for free.

Upgrade your membership for AED \n25/month and enjoy connecting with other readers,locate your favorite books nearby,find easily what books are available for sale,swap or even for free and even if you can\'t find your favorite book right now,add it to the Wishboard.No limits at all.
Start your 14 days trial period now and check out the cool features of Booxtown.\n\nAnd though we will be sad to see you go,you can stop your membership at anytime
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
Enter your email to find password
Your request has been sent successfully. Let\'s wait for Domonic\'s reply

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old.

Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source.

Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested.

Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.
